com.gcu.edu.dockerapi

Class DockerApi

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gcu.edu.dockerapi.DockerApi

  • public class DockerApi
extends java.lang.Object
    Facade Class over the actual Docker Java API.
     

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DockerApi(java.lang.String piAddress, java.lang.String registryUrl, java.lang.String registryEmail, java.lang.String registryUsername, java.lang.String registryPassword)
      Non Default Constructor that makes a connection to the Docker Engine using the Docker Java API and provided connectivity parameters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DockerApi

        public DockerApi(java.lang.String piAddress,
         java.lang.String registryUrl,
         java.lang.String registryEmail,
         java.lang.String registryUsername,
         java.lang.String registryPassword)
        Non Default Constructor that makes a connection to the Docker Engine using the Docker Java API and provided connectivity parameters.
        Parameters:
        piAddress - The IP Address to the Docker Engine.
        registryUrl - The Docker Registry URL.
        registryEmail - The Docker Registry User Email Address.
        registryUsername - The Docker Registry Login Username.
        registryPassword - The Docker Registry Login Password.

        public java.util.List<com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Image> getAllImagessInfo(boolean showAll)
        Return a List of all Docker Images.
        Parameters:
        showAll - If true will return all Images else will return filtered list.
        Returns:
        List of Image (see JavaDoc at com.github.dockerjava.api.model.Image).

      • createSwarmService

        public java.lang.String createSwarmService(CreateSwarmServiceInfo info)
        Create a Docker Swarm Service.
        Parameters:
        info - The Docker Swarm Service (see JavaDoc at com.gcu.edu.dockerapi.CreateSwarmServiceInfo).
        Returns:

      • createContainer

        public java.lang.String createContainer(CreateContainerInfo info)
        Create a Docker Container.
        Parameters:
        info - The Docker Container (see JavaDoc at com.gcu.edu.dockerapi.CreateContainerInfo).
        Returns:
        Container ID else returns null if Container was not created.

      • removeContainer

        public boolean removeContainer(java.lang.String containerId)
        Remover a Docker Container.
        Parameters:
        containerId - The ID of the Container to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the Container was removed else returns false if Container was not removed or the ID was invalid.

      • removeSwarmService

        public boolean removeSwarmService(java.lang.String serviceName)
        Remover a Docker Swarm Service.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The Name of the Swarm Service to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the Swarm Service was removed else returns false if Swarm Service was not removed or the Name was invalid.

      • getContainerLogs

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getContainerLogs(java.lang.String containerId,
                                                int lastNumber)
        Return a Containers Logs.
        Parameters:
        containerId - Container ID to get logs for.
        lastNumber - The last number of lines in the log file to retrieve.
        Returns:
        List of String that contains the last number of lines from the log file.
